Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Pharmacologic Substance/Biological Agent/Antigen/Vaccine Antigen/CTP-37
Record.BroaderTerm: Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Description: A synthetic peptide vaccine consisting of the carboxy terminal peptide (CTP) of human beta chorionic gonadotropin (beta-hCG). Vaccination with CTP-37 may stimulate the host immune system to produce antibodies against beta-HCG, leading to a decrease in the proliferation of tumor cells that overexpress beta-HCG. (NCI04)
